metadata.Title: CVE-2023-26253 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Gluster GlusterFS 11.0, there is an xlators/mount/fuse/src/fuse-bridge.c notify stack-based buffer over-read.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-26253` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

glusterfs-client - 3.7.6-1ubuntu1+esm2
glusterfs-common - 3.7.6-1ubuntu1+esm2
glusterfs-server - 3.7.6-1ubuntu1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: mdeslaur> stack-based overread is just a DoS on Ubuntu because of stack protector

criterions.comment: glusterfs package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.7.6-1ubuntu1+esm2').
